website_summaries.verdict: Spacious, attractive set that's versatile for cooking and storing food. With proper care, this durable set will last years.
pros: Deep interiors make them ideal for baking and roasting all types of foods
6-piece set includes 3 sizes (1, 2, and 3.2 quarts) with lids that are also microwave and oven safe, and can store food in the fridge
cons: Some customers received sets with broken pieces upon delivery
Lids don't provide a tight fit

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I loved this set. I bought it to add to my serving dishes for Thanksgiving. I wanted a set with lids so I could take things out and keep them warm as needed. But, the lid for my small dish cracked in the oven and now I'm too afraid to use it in case it shatters.
customer_reviews.author: hillary

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of the potential risk
customer_reviews.text: Very dangerous in use. Especially when you take the casserole out from the refreigerator and heat it on stove, it will shatter. Watch out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Safe for any warm food
customer_reviews.text: The Casserole shattered in to pieces suddenly while pouring the warm lentil soup. It cannot bear the warm food in spite of thick glass material. The way it shattered could have injured me badly.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Tiwari

customer_reviews.title: Super happy with this set.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy I made this purchase. I have used all three sizes of these casserole dishes. They are heavy but that's okay because they will stand up to a lot of use. I have used them to steam vegetables in the microwave and cook casseroles in the oven. They wash very well and come clean without issue. One added bonus is that the lid for the largest dish fits my 10" Rival crock pot that I have been unable to find a replacement lid for.
customer_reviews.author: M. Canales

customer_reviews.title: These are Worth So Much More than They Cost!!
customer_reviews.text: I just love these casserole dishes. Every time I wash them, I am inspired to write a review. Here, I am finally doing so after having them for about 8 months. They are very solid and sturdy and are much easier to clean than I expected. I had initial concerns that they might allow too much steam to escape when baking for an extended time, but that is not an issue at all. It is terrific to have a completely non-toxic set of cookware with no concern over leaching of metals or chemicals into the food. These have worked beautifully and reliably!! I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Martha J. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Convenient sizing, stylish shape, good results
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set because the look intrigued me with the shallower profile and flat bottoms. They look stylish on my shelves. I also like glass for cooking casseroles so you can easily see the progress in the oven. Had no issues in a 350 degree oven and got good results. The largest, 3 Quart is bigger than I typically need, so I am thinking of using it for storing tubes of paint in my art studio. The two and one quart are convenient sizes for me.
customer_reviews.author: mcerner

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. easy to use for making casseroles and easy to clean as well. I thought I would never find baking dishes with glass covers for oven use again as everything I see has plastic lids.
customer_reviews.author: plumbob

customer_reviews.title: Exploding Casserole!
customer_reviews.text: Made eggplant rollatini, baked in this brand new casserole dish at 350 degrees and it exploded in my oven! What a mess! Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use them very often
customer_reviews.text: These casseroles are great, and I love the different sizes in the set. I used them over the holidays and they are easy to clean. They are nice and hefty, so I think they will hold up well. I would recommend these highly.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Rossin

customer_reviews.title: Simple, inexpensive and durable set for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for some time for simple, inexpensive and durable casserole dishes. This set fit the bill. I couldn't believe the great price. I received my set intact without breakage and packed very well. It took me half and hour to remove all the protective packing material. Great product , would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: priscilla carter

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: I finally have a set of casseroles that match for the Holidays! I am Very happy with them. Heavy clean easily nice sizes!. Received 2 2qt. And only the lid for the 3.2qt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sizes and great set
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these casserole dishes. So far they've worked and held up great! I love that there's 3 different sizes so we can use them for a variety of things. My only complaint is that when I received mine, the bottoms already appear to have scratches or other imperfections in the glass. It seems to be only cosmetic though so it's fine since I bought these for personal use; however, that is why I gave them a 4.
customer_reviews.author: Liz G.

customer_reviews.title: NOT 9x12
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this specifically as it was described as 9x12... and those are almost impossible to find now. My mom had one she loved as it made the perfect thickness of her brownies but the 9x12 broke and now we can only find 9x13 pans. This one was even bigger than 9x13... so it is being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Waves Designs

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean then tupperware!
customer_reviews.text: First set I got had a broken lid,but customer service replaced the whole set no charge. I use it to prepare meals on the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: TheOldGeeser

customer_reviews.title: Works well, great value
customer_reviews.text: My husband is the family chef and loves using these to make chicken pot pie, casseroles, and (my favorite) mac & cheese. Nothing fancy, but very versatile, easy to clean, and a great value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love that they have covers.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Perfect variety of sizes. Having covers is a must, but often hard to find, esp. for this price. We bought a set for a house we rented in Florida and when we came back to Wisconsin we bought a set for our condo.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful food shows through
customer_reviews.text: My husband & I both love these. The 3 sizes are perfect for many things. We use them in the oven as well as the microwave. They replaced 2 we had for about 25 years, so we are expecting to have these for many years. They are much heavier than the old ones & can be put on the table out of the oven. Show off your food creations to your friends & family.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Clifton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Actually I ordered this set because I needed a one quart baking dish with lid. I did not want anything with a design but a plain dish that would look good with any dinnerware. The large dish with lid is perfect if you are cooking for a crowd and the medium size is perfect for a family of four or more. The dishes are sturdy and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: bpbikergirl

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: We recommend paying a little more and getting something better.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Coburn

customer_reviews.title: Well-made but heavy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace an older Corning set after a few of the covers got chipped. I've had this new set a few months and they seem to be holding up well. I use the smallest piece in the set all the time However, the larger pieces seem really heavy. I am a small woman and they are hard for me to lift into and out of my over-the-range microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Item user

customer_reviews.title: Packaged with care, made the trip without harm
customer_reviews.text: We had previously ordered this set, from a third party vendor. It came badly packaged and chipped. Of course I returned it and ordered this set. What a difference. Remember, this was an all glass set. The packaging was incredible and it arrived perfectly. My wife is thrilled, and for that, I am very happy. This set will replace an unmatched set that we have. I expect it to last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Marv Kirsch

customer_reviews.title: We love these bowls.
customer_reviews.text: They are so handy. They are great for a microwave because of the flat bottoms. They work great for leftovers also because they come with lids.
customer_reviews.author: Trish & Dave

customer_reviews.title: Versatile clear glass with covers.
customer_reviews.text: I love that these casserole dishes have lids. They all nest making them easy to store. The big one is bigger than I expected but I made a casserole in it that I normally make in a 9 x 13 pan. And since it has a cover, keeping it warm while on the table is better than a 9 x 13. The clear glass means it goes with any dish pattern. Very thick glass, very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Food heats very slowly in these dishes in the microwave
customer_reviews.text: I can't figure out why, but these dishes seem to impede the cooking of food in my microwave. Cooking in the microwave is the entire reason I bought them. I have some Corningware, and food in that Corningware cooks twice as fast.
customer_reviews.author: D. Parks

customer_reviews.title: Lids fit great
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful casserole dishes for table. Put the dinner in these dishes so I enjoyed the meal and the company and didn't have to worry about clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Lind Lindstrand

customer_reviews.text: such a great product i lvoed these to place dinner in after im done cooking, then i can also easily store them in the fridge. easy to wash love glass.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Proper review (How to use)
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good set. I noticed a lot of people complaining about it shattering on the stove but it's only meant for oven and microwavable, it WILL shatter if you use on stove top because it's not made for it most glassware is not made for that... That being said for what it is supposed to be used forbid can say it works well in the microwave and it's great to hold things that need to chill as well as bake.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Shapiama

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and versatile.
customer_reviews.text: I like to microwave in covered pyrex casserole dishes and gave this set as a gift to friends who didn't have them. They were very happy, indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Tom W

customer_reviews.title: High expectations met.
customer_reviews.text: Thick, sturdy, had in oven so far only at 170. Fine in Microwave, easy to clean, Pans 'stack' easy, but lids don't.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: you have to be careful!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it a couple time with cold dishes like salads and pastas, and today I put this in the ovenand 15 min latter it explode, can I have a refund?
customer_reviews.author: Hector Flores

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Wonderful Set!
customer_reviews.text: These are the nicest heavy duty casserole dishes I have ever used. They clean easily, cook evenly. I am pleasantly surprised at the high quality. This set would make a wonderful gift.
customer_reviews.author: C. Doerr

customer_reviews.title: They are not too heavy for older people to handle safety.
customer_reviews.text: With my bad hands the handles are wonderful. They make my life so much easier. I use the baking dishes every day.
customer_reviews.author: Barbro Strom

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used the largest dish and I actually use it a lot so for it it gets 5 stars. So far so goodp
customer_reviews.author: Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great quality - love it
customer_reviews.text: These are the best casserole dishes we have ever owned. They are versatile and there is a size for every need we have. They are easy to clean and function beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Simons

customer_reviews.title: It has to be in every kitchen !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect for cooking, baking and everything I want to do in the kitchen !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: nenarosa

customer_reviews.title: Great bakeware
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice, I’m still a bit green at baking so I’ve gotten food stuck that a seasoned chef wouldn’t have.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: You get exactly what you see. My other dish broke and these ended up being a great replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use all the time
customer_reviews.text: Use all the time. Would have rated 5 but they sure are heavy. Have high cabinets so the weight is a factor. Still, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Product came as descibed
customer_reviews.text: Recieved product packaged nicely and undamaged. 3 pieces with lids. I chose this product because of the handles. I bought other casserole dishes that looked nice but had no handles and it is difficult to get them in and out of the oven and microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Bertrand

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad set
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. A little shallow for a typical baking dish. The trivet needs a lil stretch to fit the glass dish well. Overall good set.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Decent set for the price but...
customer_reviews.text: Decent set for the price. Only reason I did not give it five stars is that the lids do not fit perfectly even all around as there is a little space in between the lid and the bottom casserole dish in some areas.
customer_reviews.author: Armor Guard Support Team

customer_reviews.title: Bake, serve and store, durable, 3 sizes
customer_reviews.text: Lovely, clear design, don’t have to guess what’s in it. Handy 3 size variety. Durable and versatile. Bake, serve and store!
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda

customer_reviews.title: My sister loves it and has continued to rain for over year. It is perfect for single or duo household
customer_reviews.text: My sister loves it and has continued to rain for over year. It is perfect for single or duo household
customer_reviews.author: EKossick

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. A little shallow for a typical vaking dish. Trivet is slightly small for the dish but stretches with use.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Saves a lot of room
customer_reviews.text: Great set and saves a lot of room by stacking
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as described. I have been looking for a casserole with a basket and they are not easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret L. Eckardt

customer_reviews.title: Good glass may be too good
customer_reviews.text: Good but cooks slowly in microwave Whats up with that?
customer_reviews.author: LSH

customer_reviews.title: Great bakeware
customer_reviews.text: I love them it’s so difficult to find glass bakeware with glass lids “I don’t want plastic Cooking in high temperature in the oven and microwave requires glass
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent baking dish but it's way too shallow.
customer_reviews.author: Tre

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not that durable...
customer_reviews.text: Love the fitted trivet with the dish. My only issue is that after one (gentle) use, one of the edges chipped already and is too sharp to use. Not as durable as I would have hoped for a casserole dish compared to other brands I have.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen George

customer_reviews.title: Libby products are the best.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my recent purchase of the Libby casserole dishes. They are so versatile & easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Brookie🍪

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sizes
customer_reviews.text: These casserole dishes fit every need. The small one is perfect for queso, and the other two for anything from macaroni to onion baked chicken. I would recommend this set for everyone and the price can't be beat!
customer_reviews.author: TexasLady813

customer_reviews.title: Great products and great shipping quality!
customer_reviews.text: This came directly from Libby and it was well packaged and the 3 sizes are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: House warming gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughters house warming gift and she absolutely loves them . She says she loves the way they stack together. They clean very well and very elegant
customer_reviews.author: darlenehawkins

customer_reviews.title: As Pictured
customer_reviews.text: The casserole dishes were as pictured with a knob incorporated into the glass lid. I was impressed with the packaging made for the items including separate padding for the lids.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Macomber

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday use!
customer_reviews.text: Use these just about everyday. Love the different sizes. Use them mainly in the microwave, but like that you can use them in the oven also! When we have company, they can see in the glass casserole dish what is being served.
customer_reviews.author: Marconurse

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. It is so hard to find a glass ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. It is so hard to find a glass baking dish with a glass lid also. They all have plastic lids which I do not like. Good Quality also.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Frist time i use the middle one the lid chip in the microwave wish i could get a replacement lid other wise it gtreat
customer_reviews.author: marv

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy with the basket
customer_reviews.text: The baking dish is fine, but the basket did not meet my expectations. I have an older basket that I have had for years that is sturdy, this new basket barely fits around the pan and is very thin.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Versitile
customer_reviews.text: They are stackable, and also can be used as mixing bowls, at least for foods that are hand mixed. Nice looking shape. However, the lids are not snug.

customer_reviews.title: Good sizes
customer_reviews.text: The product is very usable and good sizes. I had to reorder this however because the first shipment was broken in a million pieces. I might suggest better packaging.

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set & first time in oven & lid shattered in 350 degree oven ruining our stuffed shell dinner. Too late to get my money back from Amazon. DONT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My wife got this abot a week ago and we just used them for dinner. They look pretty and hold plenty of food.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! It is difficult to find good casseroles with glass lids.

customer_reviews.title: Great Glass Casserole Dishes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these Libbey Round Glass Casseroles! They are the perfect sizes. The original (manufacturer) box was wrapped in bubble wrap and then air cushions protected that box even more. I was a little hesitant, ordering glass dishes through the mail, but - they arrived in perfect condition, a heavier outer box was used to add additional protection. The set arrived super fast - thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Useful casserole set
customer_reviews.text: We dropped and broke our Corningware dutch oven & needed are replacement. We bought this for the largest piece... a dish we could oven bake a casserole in, leave the leftovers in it to refridgerate, and then pop it in the microwave to re-heat. These three dishes have been in constant use since we got them. They work great and clean up easily for everyday use, and look good enough for company.

I had to contact customer service and I have to say --they were most friendly and professional-- I received ONE OF THE BEST CUSTOMER SERVICES EVER. I would most definitely order from this company again.

customer_reviews.title: So useful

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely lovable dinner wear. They look classy and the size is perfect. Came in an excellent condition. I have not used them in an oven or in a microwave so will not comment on their durability there. But if you pour hot stuff into it, it for sure holds well.
customer_reviews.author: Ayushi Parameswaran

product_meta.title: Libbey Baker's Basics 3-Piece Glass Casserole Baking Dish Set with Glass Covers
product_meta.description:
Color:3-Piece Dish Set w/ Covers

The Libbey Baker's Basics 3-piece Glass Bake Set with 3 Covers is pure, simple, and transparent. Watch from all sides as your food heats evenly, and then serve directly from any of the 3 attractive, see-through glass covered casseroles. Use them to store leftovers in the fridge or freezer afterward.

Celebrate This! with Glassware from Libbey
If you’ve ever sipped from a glass, odds are you’ve already met Libbey. We rank as the top glassware manufacturer in the Americas and one of the largest tableware suppliers in the world. As the runaway leader, we are setting new standards for stability, strength, and growth opportunity. We believe every occasion — big and small — is an opportunity to celebrate life.
feature_bullets: Revolutionary glass construction makes these versatile casseroles safe for oven, microwave, refrigerator, and freezer; clear sides let you monitor baking, serve your creation in style, and see what's inside while stored
Quickly find the perfect casserole—easy-to-read dimensions are embossed on the handles of 3 of our most popular sizes
Includes 1, 1-quart round glass casserole with glass cover; 1, 2-quart round glass casserole with glass cover; and 1, 3.2-quart round glass casserole with glass cover
